doc.field: Alexander Jackson Davis architectural drawing collection
Alexander Jackson Davis architectural drawing collection
Public Buildings in the City of New-York
Public Buildings in the City of New-York

6 drawings on one sheet, drawn by A.J. Davis and engraved by William D. Smith. Buildings pictured are the Rotunda-Chambers Street; Merchant's Exchange, Wall Street; 2nd Unitarian Church- Mercer c. Prince; Synagogue- Elm Street; U.S. Branch Bank- Wall Street; Masonic Hall- Broadway.
